member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.Presentation
member.summary: Controls how a frame is presented with options to set the output resolution, crop the input, and choose how to map the input pixels onto the output frame geometry (for example, by stretching the input frame to match the specified output frame, or fitting the input frame using letterboxing).

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.Presentation.LayoutScaleToFit
member.summary: Empty pixels added above and below the input frame (for letterboxing), or to the left and right of the input frame (for pillarboxing), until the desired aspect ratio is achieved.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.Presentation.LayoutScaleToFitWithCrop
member.summary: Pixels cropped from the input frame, until the desired aspect ratio is achieved.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.Presentation.LayoutStretchToFit
member.summary: Frame stretched larger on the x or y axes to fit the desired aspect ratio.

member.summary: Holds a progress percentage.

member.summary: The held progress, expressed as an integer percentage.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.ScaleToFitTransformation
member.summary: Specifies a simple rotation and/or scale to apply in the vertex shader.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException
member.summary: Thrown when a non-locally recoverable transformation failure occurs.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCode
member.summary: An error code which identifies the cause of the transformation failure.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeDecoderInitFailed
member.summary: Caused by a decoder initialization failure.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeDecodingFailed
member.summary: Caused by a failure while trying to decode media samples.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeDecodingFormatUnsupported
member.summary: Caused by trying to decode content whose format is not supported.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeEncoderInitFailed
member.summary: Caused by an encoder initialization failure.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeEncodingFailed
member.summary: Caused by a failure while trying to encode media samples.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeFailedRuntimeCheck
member.summary: Caused by a failed runtime check.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeGlInitFailed
member.summary: Caused by a GL initialization failure.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeGlProcessingFailed
member.summary: Caused by a failure while using or releasing a GL program.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoBadHttpStatus
member.summary: Caused by an HTTP server returning an unexpected HTTP response status code.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoCleartextNotPermitted
member.summary: Caused by the player trying to access cleartext HTTP traffic (meaning http:// rather than https://) when the app's Network Security Configuration does not permit it.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoFileNotFound
member.summary: Caused by a non-existent file.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoInvalidHttpContentType
member.summary: Caused by a server returning a resource with an invalid "Content-Type" HTTP header value.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoNetworkConnectionFailed
member.summary: Caused by a network connection failure.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoNetworkConnectionTimeout
member.summary: Caused by a network timeout, meaning the server is taking too long to fulfill a request.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoNoPermission
member.summary: Caused by lack of permission to perform an IO operation.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoReadPositionOutOfRange
member.summary: Caused by reading data out of the data bound.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeIoUnspecified
member.summary: Caused by an Input/Output error which could not be identified.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeMuxingFailed
member.summary: Caused by a failure while muxing media samples.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeOutputFormatUnsupported
member.summary: Caused by the output format for a track not being supported.

member.name: F:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeUnspecified
member.summary: Caused by an error whose cause could not be identified.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.TimestampMs
member.summary: The value of SystemClock#elapsedRealtime() when this exception was created.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationException.ErrorCodeName
member.summary: Equivalent to TransformationException#getErrorCodeName(int) TransformationException.getErrorCodeName(this.errorCode).

member.summary: Creates an instance for an unexpected exception.

member.summary: Returns whether the error data associated to this exception equals the error data associated to other.

member.summary: Returns the name of a given errorCode.

member.name: T:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest
member.summary: A media transformation request.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.AudioMimeType
member.summary: The requested output audio sample MimeTypes MIME type, or null if inferred from the input.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.EnableHdrEditing
member.summary: Whether to attempt to process any input video stream as a high dynamic range (HDR) signal.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.EnableRequestSdrToneMapping
member.summary: Whether to request tone-mapping to standard dynamic range (SDR).

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.FlattenForSlowMotion
member.summary: Whether the input should be flattened for media containing slow motion markers.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.OutputHeight
member.summary: The requested height of the output video, or C#LENGTH_UNSET if inferred from the input.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.RotationDegrees
member.summary: The requested rotation, in degrees, of the output video, or 0 if inferred from the input.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.ScaleX
member.summary: The requested scale factor, on the x-axis, of the output video, or 1 if inferred from the input.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.ScaleY
member.summary: The requested scale factor, on the y-axis, of the output video, or 1 if inferred from the input.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationRequest.VideoMimeType
member.summary: The requested output video sample MimeTypes MIME type, or null if inferred from the input.

member.summary: Information about the result of a successful transformation.

member.summary: The average bitrate of the audio track data, or C#RATE_UNSET_INT if unset or unknown.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationResult.AverageVideoBitrate
member.summary: The average bitrate of the video track data, or C#RATE_UNSET_INT if unset or unknown.

member.summary: The duration of the file in milliseconds, or C#TIME_UNSET if unset or unknown.

member.summary: The size of the file in bytes, or C#LENGTH_UNSET if unset or unknown.

member.name: P:Com.Google.Android.Exoplayer2.Transformer.TransformationResult.VideoFrameCount
member.summary: The number of video frames.

member.summary: Indicates that the progress is available.

member.summary: Indicates that there is no current transformation.

member.summary: Indicates that the progress is permanently unavailable for the current transformation.
